name: BallRoll
description:
Experience metaphorical descent into the land of darkness and then back to the light. Guide your ball through this insane hand crafted world, which become more difficult as you play more!
Maneuver it to avoid deadly obstacles, jump to the beat of classic style music, reach the endline in one piece!

Game Features:
- Multiple balls to choose
- Life regenarator tool
- The game gets faster as more you play!
